errors.name: InvalidInitialDeposit
errors.msg: Initial deposits must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount: must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidOrderStatus
errors.msg: Invalid order status for this operation

errors.name: PriceConditionNotMet
errors.msg: Price condition not met for execution

errors.name: InvalidAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid authority - must be configured authority

errors.name: InvalidVault
errors.msg: Invalid vault - must be pool's token vault

errors.name: InvalidPool
errors.msg: Invalid pool - order does not belong to this pool

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: Invalid LP mint - must be pool's LP token mint
